name: Purgatory Dragon Deity, Favrneel
effect: [CONT]:You may only have one "Purgatory Dragon Deity, Favrneel" in the deck.[AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your main phase, your opponent chooses one of their rear-guards, retires it, and if you did not ride this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000/[Critical] +1.[AUTO](VC):When your opponent's rear-guard is retired during your turn, [COST][put a card from hand into soul], and draw a card.[AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:At the end of the battle this unit attacked, if the sum of the grades of 《Dark States》 cards in your soul is thirteen or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], [Stand] this unit, and it gets drive-1 until end of turn.
flavor: You too shall slumber within me...... Overlay Andvaranaut!

name: Gear Rhinos of Barrelling Impulsion
effect: [CONT](VC):When you would ride from the ride deck, you can ride with "[Soul-Blast 1]" instead of "Choose a card from hand, and discard it".
flavor: No need to think about troublesome things. You'll understand when you move forward.

name: Divigating Chopper
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: The wandering blade shall disconnect the old customs.

name: Clock-hands Dracokid
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Now, let's go and move time forward!

name: Reaper in the Shadows, Zeilmort
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit into soul], look at the top two cards of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, call it to (RC), and put the rest into soul.
flavor: Death awaits all. It is a noble ritual that cleanses the soul.

name: Execution Dragon, Vorpal Scythe Dragon
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.[AUTO](RC):When this unit's attack hits, you may [Soul-Charge 2].
flavor: His dragon is a "guillotine". An inescapable manifestation of death.

name: Time Jarett Dragon
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][put a card from hand into soul], and draw a card.
flavor: The zodiac time beasts entrusted all their powers to the great hero.

name: Purgatory Baron, Hrodis
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked a vanguard, if you have a vanguard with "Favrneel" in its card name, [COST][put this unit into soul], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire it.[AUTO](Soul):At the beginning of your ride phase, if you have a vanguard with "Favrneel" in its card name, [COST][bind this card & discard a card from hand], activate persona ride, and until end of turn, you cannot activate persona ride with other card effects, and you cannot ride.
flavor: Oh lord of fallen shine, give me power!

name: Squalid Freaks
effect: [CONT](Soul):If you did not ride this turn, this card gets grade +2.[AUTO](Soul):When your grade 3 or greater vanguard attacks, if you did not ride this turn, [COST][bind this card], and all of your front row units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: A soul that strays from the path will never find peace.

name: Steam Mage, Ashur-da
effect: [CONT](GC):If your soul has seven or more cards, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.[AUTO]:When this unit is retired from (GC), you may put this card into soul.
flavor: The loss of magical powers must be suppressed to the minimum.

name: Steam Battler, Gungnram
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [Soul-Charge 1].[ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Soul-Blast 3], and draw a card.
flavor: Your very existence will be erased. We can't leave any trace of you in history after all.

name: Friend of the Netherworld, Ling
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), look at the top two cards of your deck, choose a card from among them, put it into soul, and put the rest on the bottom of the deck.
flavor: With everyone here, I don't have time to feel lonely.

name: Repelled Malice Dragon
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck) [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from hand, and discard it.
flavor: Picking up on the slightest malice, and beating it down with its twin wings.

name: Hades Dragon Deity of Resentment, Gallmageheld
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] Trigger +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - You get "During your turn, all of your vanguards get [Power] +10000/[Critical] +1" until end of this fight!
flavor: Once resentment is planted, it will remain across eras as the root of evil.

name: Flinty Slasher
flavor: All limbs can become weapons. In other words, an additional strike from here.

name: Lively Breath Dragon
flavor: The resplendent flame that bursts forth. You have also become a captive of the circus.

name: Advanced Clock Dragon
flavor: The needles on the clock, nobody will notice if it is moved forward a little, right?

name: Direful Doll, Alexandra
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: Behold my special performance, one that never ends.

name: Demonic Swordsman of Riving, Eligos
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, if you have a vanguard with "Favrneel" in its card name, [COST][put one other rear-guard into soul], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, retire it, and if the sum of the grades of 《Dark States》 cards in your soul is thirteen or greater, [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: Even as he stood in the edge of darkness, there is no hesitation in his sword.

name: Crimson Igspeller
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks a vanguard, [Soul-Charge 1].[ACT](Soul):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Put this card into drop], [Soul-Charge 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Don't go burning out on me, alright? 'cause this ain't anywhere near max firepower yet!

name: Falcate Performer
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, choose up to one card from your drop, and if your soul does not have a card with the same grade as that card, put it into soul.
flavor: A fun night with the crescent moon. Is there anyone feeling left out?

name: Brainwash Swirler
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [Soul-Charge 1].[AUTO](RC):When your card is put into soul by [Soul-Charge], if your vanguard is grade 3 or greater, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. (+10000 if [Soul-Charge 2])
flavor: Look into my eyes. Yes...... That's a good boy.

name: Gratias Gradale
effect: Regalis Piece(You may only have one Regalis Piece in your deck, and use it a total of one time in a fight)Play this if you have a grade 3 vanguard with persona ride and you did not ride this turn!Activate persona ride. (Draw a card, all of your front row units get [Power] +10000 this turn, and you are regarded to have persona rode)
flavor: Somewhere among the stars, the primordial blue fills the cup and waits for the seeker.
